str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
(a) a door, (b) met: an opportunity. Apparently a primary word; a portal or entrance.
Effective, productive of due result, at work. From en and ergon; active, operative.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To resist, oppose, withstand, lie opposite to. From anti and keimai; to lie opposite, i.e. Be adverse to.
